posts.description:
üåéThe earth without art is just eh !!! üåç
-
The Louvre - No matter how many times I visit, I find a new corridor to explore, and old favorite that reveals a new detail, a new history or story to inspire.
-
Seemed an appropriate way to celebrate Earth Day on April 22 to not have a eh day!
-
What‚Äôs your favorite piece of art?

Cappy Birthday to ME!  Nope that‚Äôs not a spelling error - I celebrated another year older/wiser/better with this gorgeous balloon ride in Cappadocia, Turkey!
-
Belated post to thank everyone for the wonderful birthday wishes. It could not have been a better one.
-
I am back on the road traveling extensively through Europe and the Middle East this year‚Ä¶ just hit 49 countries.. with hopes to finally get to Asia!
-
So many great things on the horizon. I sold my share in the company I founded, InstaRevealed.com today - this is my second sale of an online marketing company.  I love being an entrepreneur, creating products to fill online marketing niches, and building & selling companies.
-
A new year, a new chapter, a renewed energy to travel and create. Work isn‚Äôt work when it‚Äôs this fun!

Oh those bluebonnets make me happy!!!
-
Pulling over on the side of roads to admire little blue flowers is the Texans favorite pursuit of leisure for a few weeks every spring.
-
What I actually love most about bluebonnet season in the Hill Country all around Austin is people enjoy the simplicity of nature.
-
Happiness is easy. Happiness is a choice

Walking in the footsteps of the Impressionists in Honfleur.
-
This famous port in Normandy was a favorite of the Impressionists in the 1800's including Monet and Boudin.
-
This small French town still retains it's charm today with tiny windy cobblestone streets, apple ciders üçé, and French treats.
-
@travellermade endorsed luxury travel!
-
#eol2017 #visitnormandy

Blues and greens on the Normandy coastline.
-
Excited to be back on the road and in one of my favorite areas - the Northern coastline of France. üá´üá∑
-
@travellermade endorsed luxury travel!
-
First stop is Deauxville! #eol2017

posts.description:
Happy New Years from one of my favorite places in the world - Firenze!!!
-
This city has always felt like a second home and continues to be a place to revisit for me. And I always finding something new to discover or inspire me.
-
This picture is a moment frozen in time as I am so excited for 2017!!!
-
Happy New Years!!!!

The magic of Christmas in Trafalgar Square.üéÑ
-
The Trafalgar Square Christmas tree is a Christmas tree donated to the people of Britain by the city of Oslo, Norway each year since 1947 in gratitude for their assistance during WWII. The tree is prominently displayed in Trafalgar Square from the beginning of December until 6 January.
-
2016's tree from Oslo was voted 'London's Least Christmassy Tree', but I still loved the beautiful lights and scene.

Walked into a Winterland fantasy at the Corinthia Hotel London that has been inspired by Swan Lake.
-
I enjoyed a wonderful afternoon tea under the Baccarat chandelier.
-
Have you been to the Corinthia? üéÑ
-
#corinthialondon #ad

Rainy street scene of the historic Corinthia Hotel London viewed from the Hungerford Bridge.
-
Enjoying the European Christmas festivities in London this year including the wintery bliss inside this hotel inspired by Swan Lake.
-
Click the Link in Profile to see inside.
-

Stunning afternoon walking through golden fields and seeing the windmills at Kinderdijk.
-
Perfect last day cruising with @vikingcruises on the Rhine with the perfect light.
-
#VikingSocial #MyVikingStory #VikingCruises
